about_the_game:
Easter is here, it’s time to put all the eggs in one basket! With this collection of 10 Easter themed unique bus skins, you can fully embrace this colourful holiday wherever you drive.

The list of “Easter - Paint Jobs” includes:

  • Easter Bun
  • Easter patterned
  • Easter Garden
  • Running Bunny
  • Hidden Bunny
  • Hatching
  • Chicken n’ Eggs
  • Bus Bunny
  • Pastel Bunny
  • Fluffy Hatchings

All paint jobs are fully compatible with all buses, including articulated, double-decker, and e-buses.
detailed_description:
Easter is here, it’s time to put all the eggs in one basket! With this collection of 10 Easter themed unique bus skins, you can fully embrace this colourful holiday wherever you drive.

The list of “Easter - Paint Jobs” includes:

  • Easter Bun
  • Easter patterned
  • Easter Garden
  • Running Bunny
  • Hidden Bunny
  • Hatching
  • Chicken n’ Eggs
  • Bus Bunny
  • Pastel Bunny
  • Fluffy Hatchings

All paint jobs are fully compatible with all buses, including articulated, double-decker, and e-buses.

name: Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop - Easter Skin Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 / AMD Phenom II X4 830 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon R9 280 (2GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 / AMD FC-8140z or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 (8GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 (8GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space

short_description: Easter is here, it’s time to put all the eggs in one basket! With this collection of 10 Easter themed unique bus skins, you can fully embrace this colourful holiday wherever you drive.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
